attributes.action: Oust Jeremy Corbyn as an MP. He opposes everything we as a nation we stand for.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn is an extreme left-winger. Whether it's weakening our defenses, raising taxes on jobs and earnings, racking up more debt and welfare or driving up the cost of living by printing money. He supports terror groups and wants to open our doors to immigrants. Corbyn will ruin our country!
